alert.note: Alert for Macomb (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 6:42PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Macomb County through 730 PM EDT... At 642 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sterling Heights, or near Warren, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Mount Clemens around 655 PM EDT. Macomb Township around 700 PM EDT. New Baltimore around 720 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include New Haven, Roseville, Shelby Township, Ray Center, Chesterfield Township, Clinton Township, Utica, Fraser and Washington. People attending Jimmy Johns Field should seek safe shelter immediately! MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
